snippet: Mayor Ed Murray’s proposal would bring to nine the number of authorized tent cities in the city as he takes steps to address what he called a “full-blown crisis” over homelessness.
abstract: Seattle Mayor Ed Murray plans to ask City Council to approve three additional homeless encampments to address what he describes as 'full-blown' homelessness crisis; approval would bring number of authorized tent cities in Seattle to nine.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Ed Murray’s proposal would bring to nine the number of authorized tent cities in the city as he takes steps to address what he called a “full-blown crisis” over homelessness.

headline.print_headline: Washington: More Tent Cities Sought for Homeless in Seattle
headline.main: Washington: More Tent Cities Sought for Homeless in Seattle
